'''Huffman Schmidt''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in the [[City of Mondstadt]], [[Mondstadt]]. He patrols the street across the [[Angel's Share]] tavern.

==Location==
<gallery>
NPC Location Huffman.png|Huffman's location
NPC Location Huffman Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
Huffman is the older brother of [[Mika]] and has been working as member of the [[Knights of Favonius]] for at least three years.<ref>{{Ref/CS|Klee|1}}</ref><ref>{{Ref/CS|Klee|5}}</ref> As a member of the Knights of Favonius, his responsibilities includes conducting safety patrols and restocking and dispensing medication together with [[Swan]].<ref>{{Ref/CS|Lisa|3}}</ref> He has previously interacted with [[Alice]], [[Klee|Klee's]] mother, before she left Mondstadt and scolded both of them for causing trouble.

Aside from being a knight, Huffman is also a member of Barbara Fan Club and has received an autograph from Barbara because of his professional personality compared to other fans.

===Appearance===
Huffman wears one of the standard uniforms of the Knights of Favonius. The uniform consists of a black long-sleeve shirt, horse riding pants, gloves, and brown leather shoulder pads with brass-accented white plate armor worn on top. His vambraces however are black. Wing motifs decorate various parts of the armor along with the Knights of Favonius crest on the breastplate. A sheathed sword hangs from his belt on his left side and a blowing horn hangs from the back of his hip.

==Trivia==
* His English voice actor, Cory Yee, also voices the playable Geo character [[Gorou]].
* He shares the same name with a character in Vol. 6 of ''[[Vera's Melancholy]]''. Aside from sharing the same name, the both of them are called knights.
** Most of the volumes of Vera's Melancholy are obtained from the [[Knights of Favonius Headquarters]].
* Before completing the {{Quest|A Long Shot}}, Huffman will greet the Traveler with the Knight salute. After that, he will no longer perform the salute and his dialogue will change to address them as Honorary Knight.

===Etymology===
* Huffman is an alternate spelling of Hoffmann, a German occupational surname referring to the owner or manager of a piece of land.<ref>Wikitionary: {{wt|Hoffman}}</ref>
